articles.author: Amanda Sealy and John Bonifield, CNN
articles.title: Lab studies suggest Pfizer, Moderna vaccines can protect against coronavirus variant - CNN
articles.description: A new report published in the New England Journal of Medicine on Wednesday suggests that Pfizer-BioNTech's Covid-19 vaccine can protect people against concerning new coronavirus variants, including one first seen in South Africa called B.1.351.
